title: Hillary Clinton To Launch Presidential Campaign On Sunday
teaser: We get the latest news on the race for 2016 from NPR's Tamara Keith and Paul Steinhauser of NH1 News and The Washington Post.
contentencoded:
Rand Paul joined the 2016 presidential race this week, Hillary Clinton is expected to on Sunday and Marco Rubio is expected to announce on Monday.

Tamara Keith of NPR and Paul Steinhauser of NH1 News and The Washington Post join Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to look at how the candidates are positioning themselves to run for the White House in 2016.

  • See more in our weekly series about the race for 2016

Guests

  • Tamara Keith, NPR White House correspondent. She tweets @tamarakeithNPR.
  • Paul Steinhauser, Political Director at NH1 News and special political correspondent for The Washington Post. He tweets @steinhauserNH1.
